edu.thangiah.strutsutility

Class StrutsSelect<Entity extends EntityInterface>

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.thangiah.strutsutility.StrutsSelect<Entity>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StrutsElementValidator

    public class StrutsSelect<Entity extends EntityInterface>
extends java.lang.Object
implements StrutsElementValidator
    Utility class for parsing and generating struts2 jsp select elements from a given datasource.
    Author:
    Kelly Smith
